title: Placed in low priority que
body: So I started a match and my computer decided to act slow when starting a match (it happens every now and then) and the team restarted match and when it sends me back into client it says im placed in low priotirty for being afk? So now I have 10 minute ques... any help?

replies.body:
You ended up with that LPQ since you weren't able to load into the match fast enough. Since you were *techinically* afk (since you hadn't loaded it yet) your team was able to issue a remake. At that point you would have already been afk long enough to be marked as a leaver, which is why you had the LPQ applied. 

This does kinda suck since you didn't leave intentionally, but you not loading in quick enough still could have ruined the match for 9 other people. I'd consider updating a couple network settings to see if we can get you loaded into those matches quicker! Update your port forwarding and DNS settings by following the steps in this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and test it out in a custom/practice game first.
